1.content: Research & Technical Planning untuk Blockchain Integration
1.details:
1. Research Solana wallet integration (Phantom, Solflare)
2. Study Erebus Protocol's API endpoints dan SDK usage
3. Plan blockchain transaction flow (private deposits/transfers)
4. Research Jupiter Aggregator integration
5. Define technical architecture untuk privacy features

2.details:
1. Buat design system berdasarkan Erebus Protocol
2. Design landing page dengan privacy/blockchain theming
3. Design dashboard interface untuk users
4. Design wallet connection UI
5. Create responsive design untuk semua devices

3.details:
1. Setup React/Next.js frontend dengan wallet integration
2. Implement blockchain wallet connection (Phantom, Solflare)
3. Build backend API untuk blockchain interactions
4. Implement privacy transaction features (mock/simulation)
5. Integrate Jupiter Aggregator untuk token swapping
6. Build dashboard dengan real-time data
7. Setup Supabase untuk user management

4.details:
1. Test wallet integration di testnet/devnet
2. Test blockchain transactions dengan small amounts
3. Security testing untuk wallet connections
4. Performance optimization
5. Deploy to production environment

5.content: UI/UX Upgrade: Cyber-Tech Lite dengan Light Theme
5.details:
1. Analisis konekt.market UI/UX patterns
2. Design Cyber-Tech Lite theme dengan light mode
3. Implement gradients, glassmorphism, subtle animations
4. Maintain Light theme dengan cyber-tech aesthetics
5. Upgrade komponen UI untuk lebih modern
6. Test responsive design dan accessibility

6.details:
1. Convert semua konten dari Bahasa Indonesia ke English
2. Maintain professional blockchain/DeFi terminology
3. SEO optimization untuk international audience
4. Test semua 4 halaman (Landing, Dashboard, Technology, About)
5. Deploy updated version

7.content: Dashboard Enhancement: Privacy Controls & Trade & Transfer
7.details:
1. Implement Privacy Controls Panel (Standard/Enhanced/Maximum)
2. Add Trade & Transfer Privately functionality (Step 03 style)
3. Build Enhanced Privacy Score System
4. Add Transaction Privacy Verification
5. Implement ZK proof status tracking
6. Add privacy level indicators dan cryptographic guarantees
7. Update UI dengan feature cards seperti Erebus original
8. Test semua privacy features

8.details:
1. Rebrand dari Erebus Protocol ke ZKProtocol
2. Ganti section 'How It Works' menjadi 'User Flow'
3. Create 4-step user journey yang user-friendly
4. Update semua branding references di website
5. Update document title dan meta tags
6. Maintain semua functionality existing
7. Deploy updated version
